text: Jak II is a video game for Sony's PlayStation 2 made by Naughty Dog. It is the second game in the Jak and Daxter series. ==Story== Jak, Daxter and Keira test out a Precursor artifact, with a giant creature being summoned. They get sucked into the portal, with Jak and Daxter landing in a dystopian city called Haven City. Jak has been tortured for two years by Baron Praxis and is able to speak. ==References== Category:2003 video games Category:Jak and Daxter Category:Naughty Dog games Category:3D platformers Category:Action-adventure games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Post-apocalyptic video games Category:Science fiction video games Category:Single-player video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Video game prequels Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about revenge Category:Video games about time travel Category:Video games developed in the United States
title: Jak II
